experience.title: Senior Market Analyst
experience.description: Traded US, Australian, and Canadian fixed income derivatives, specializing in Short Term Interest Rate and Bonds Futures.Leveraged models along with macroeconomic research techniques and strategies in spreads and butterflies, culminating in the creation of effective time-based trading strategies.Developed models using unprocessed fundamental quantitative and statistical data from Reuters and Bloomberg to make strategic trade calls.
